CustomField.formula: LPAD(TEXT(FLOOR(((Call_End_Time__c - Call_Start_Time__c) * 24 * 60 * 60)/3600)),2,"0") + ":" + LPAD(TEXT( FLOOR(MOD(((Call_End_Time__c - Call_Start_Time__c) * 24 * 60 * 60),3600)/60)), 2, "0") + ":" + LPAD(TEXT(MOD(MOD(((Call_End_Time__c - Call_Start_Time__c) * 24 * 60 * 60),3600),60)), 2, "0")
CustomField.label: Call Duration Sec
